
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a startcase string, where the first character of each
    word is uppercase.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating if value is a startcase string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( 'Beep Boop' )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( 'Beep and Boop' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
